search_results.title: Alok Kanojia
search_results.snippet: Alok M. Kanojia, also known as Dr. K. (born October 7, 1982), is an American psychiatrist and co-founder of the mental health coaching company Healthy Gamer ...

search_results.title: Meet Dr. K
search_results.snippet: Dr. K, as he's known to many online, is a Harvard-trained psychiatrist and lifelong gamer. · He is the world's leading expert on modern mental health issues.

search_results.title: Dr Alok Kanojia
search_results.snippet: Biography ... Dr Kanojia, known widely as 'Dr K,' is the world's foremost expert on video game psychology and author of How to Raise a Healthy Gamer.
